comment.name: Alastair
comment.yourcomment: Don't forget ctrl-r. It does an incremental reverse search through your history. Hard to explain, easy to use. For example, to find the most recent usage of make in your history, just type ctrl-r m-a-k-e.Easy, and invaluable!I'm seriously considering the effort of learning Z shell, as it is loaded with shortcuts like this.
